entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `Type` parameter overload to Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection resolver delegate method #102970
  • event handle leak issue of using ConcurrentDictionary in .net8.0 in win10 #102969
  • .Net 6.0 Environment.CommandLine and Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() unable to get the correct command line parameters #102968
  • Startup crash F# AOT on Android #102966
  • Use of certain GameKit APIs cause crash when running an iOS app on Mac #102964

Closed

  • Test failure: SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #20675
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't needlessly track the method handle for hwintrinsics when optimizations are disabled #102973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove cached cgroup values #102971
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Test CI #102967
    NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into natural loops #102965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Documentation fix for Socket.Select #102963
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix retry loop around Process.Kill #102962
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add dotnet-diag to area-diagnostics-coreclr #102925
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Activate some H/3 tests, consistent ConfigureAwait, RemoteExecutor.DisposeAsync #102699
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2465046 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102960
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • need to account for unsuccessful commit case when hardlimit isn't on #102961
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please add support for colorizing c# code that happens to be in raw string literals. #73822

PullRequests

Updated

  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56027
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56026
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, json_middleware, plainTextSansFilter #56025
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #56024
  • [9.0-preview.5] OpenAPI with native AoT usage generates trim warnings #56023
  • Add support for an interface for OpenAPI operation transformations #56022
  • [9.0-preview.5] Confusing need to include parameters in custom JSON serializer for native AoT support with OpenAPI #56021
  • Function call from Blazor app gets stuck, works fine from Web API app #56020
  • Blazor: Support generating ID attributes based on the binding expression similar to how Name attributes are already generated #56019
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #56018
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #56017
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #56016
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #56015
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, json_middleware #56014

Closed

  • Move service worker support to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #46999
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Large remote videos fail to load in Blazor #56005
  • Interactive Blazor application doesn't work when accessed through "Dev Tunnels" #55962

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] On .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 4, a modal full screen window is not properly maximized #22784
  • Ping on iOS #22783

Closed

  • Picker goes into infinite loop when updating ItemsSource ObservableCollection during SelectedIndex update #19702
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected #20703
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Navigation layout improvement #22785
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    community ✨

Merged

  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, stale

Updated

  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, stale, area-controls-toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22660
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `DivideByZeroException` in `ef_divide` and `ef_mod` #33877
  • Compiled model: An item with the same key has already been added #33874

Closed

  • Query: incorrect results for a very complex predicate with bitwise operations #30248
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SQL Server translation of `IndexOf` #33876
  • Translate logical Boolean operators as conditional Boolean operators #33873
  • Fix and enable `Bitwise_and_on_expression_with_like_and_null_check_being_compared_to_false` #33872

Merged

  • Fix SQL Server operator precedence table #33875
  • Re-enable fixed tests #33871

Updated

  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
  • Fix optimization of `CASE op WHEN` #33869
  • Fix `unhex()` nullability #33870
  • Fix to #33443 - JSON path is not properly formatted #33771
